Module WGUScheduler
Package com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Controllers

Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Controllers.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
ReportController is a class that handles the functionality for the reports screen of the application. It displays reports related to appointments, such as appointments by month and type, hourly volume, and appointments by contact.
